>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/evaluate/{thread_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Run LLM-as-Judge evaluation on a completed board meeting.

Scores the meeting decision on reasoning quality, evidence usage,
risk assessment, cost efficiency, and recommendation clarity.

DYN-107: Evaluation template
DYN-108: Automated trigger
DYN-109: Regression alerting
